## âœ… Release Checklist

- [ ] **Stage 0 - Finishing Touches**

- [ ] **Stage 3 - Release**
  - [ ] Tag Oracle
  - [ ] Tag SDK
  - [ ] CLI and App needs to point to SDK version and have its own tag
- [ ] **Stage 4 - After release
  - [ ] ...
